Class oracle.html.Link

Class oracle.html.Link 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.Link
public class Link
extends Item
Description:

Link Class encapsulates a HyperLink object Note:
This cnly constitutes the link part of ANCHOR element as specified in HTML2

Instructions:

Use this class to add hyperlinks to your HTML page.

Example: 

// Create a simple Link pointing to URL "http://www.oracle.com"
Link link = new Link ("http://www.oracle.com", "Go to Oracle's Home Page");

See Also:
Item, Frame, Frameset

Link(String, IHtmlItem, String)
Creates a Link Object

Creates a Link Object
Link(String, String)
Creates a Link Object
Link(Anchor, IHtmlItem)
Creates a Link Object pointing to an anchor (within the same page)
Link(URL, IHtmlItem)

Add an item to be hyperlinked in this object
endTag()
Returns the End Tag of this Link Object
print()
Prints content of this object to System.out

Returns the Start Tag of this Link Object
toHTML()
Returns content of this object as HTML String
toString()
Returns content of this object as regular string
viewWidth()
Returns the viewable width (excluding tags) of this link

Link 
  public Link(String url,
              IHtmlItem item,
              String target)
Creates a Link Object
Parameters:
url - the url for the hyperlink
item - the item to be hyperlink activated
target - the target window
Link 
  public Link(String url,
              IHtmlItem item)
Creates a Link Object
Parameters:
url - specifies the URL for this link
item - specifies the item to be hyperlinked
Link 
  public Link(String url,
              String text)
Creates a Link Object
Parameters:
url - specifies the URL for this link
text - specifies the text to be hyperlinked
Link 
  public Link(Anchor anchor,
              IHtmlItem item)
Creates a Link Object pointing to an anchor (within the same page)
Parameters:
anchor - an anchor object (the target of this link)
item - specifies the item to be hyperlinked
